document.full_text: rafa nadal was basking in his record-equaling sixth french open title as he arrived in rainy london on monday for the grasscourt swing, still the leader of a golden generation for men's tennis.
document.title: men's game in rude health as wimbledon looms
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal was basking in his record-equaling sixth french open title as he arrived in rainy london on monday for the grasscourt swing, still the leader of a golden generation for men's tennis.
